Title: Persuasion
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Steve Kornacki, Alyson Evans, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman's relationship with Emma weakens his bond with Norma; Romero asks Norman some hard questions.
